name: WeatherWizard
0:
”Alexa, open weather wizard”
”Can you give me the weekly forecast”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: change me
des:
**Weather Wizard**

Weather Wizard, your ultimate weather companion, is now better than ever with exciting new features and improvements. To get started, simply say, "Alexa, open Weather Wizard." No additional hardware or account requirements are needed; it works seamlessly on all Alexa-enabled devices. Our latest update introduces personalized weather notifications, allowing you to tailor your alerts to match your preferences. Stay informed about severe weather conditions with enhanced weather alerts that provide critical information in real-time. Weather Wizard now offers a premium subscription, Weather Wizard Plus, for an ad-free experience and exclusive features. Activate accessibility mode for an inclusive and user-friendly interaction. To explore all these new features, start your day with Weather Wizard today. Please note that while using trademarks and brands, we have obtained the necessary permissions, as indicated in our Testing Instructions. Stay ahead of the weather, and thank you for choosing Weather Wizard as your preferred weather assistant.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
